messages.title: Thank you for sharing your day with me. #greetingsname.given-name, I need your help.
messages.subtitle: A customer gave a restaurant a 1star rating. His review was "I will never come back. Customer service was poor. It's such a waste of my time. This is the last time I will return." How many stars will you give from reading this review? (1 star=Lousy. 5 stars=Excellent.) /1star  /2stars  /3stars  /4stars  /5stars
